trans-unit.source: Dedicated groups in Azure Active Directory | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Dedicated groups in Azure Active Directory | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Overview of how dedicated groups work in Azure Active Directory and how they are created.
trans-unit.target: Overview of how dedicated groups work in Azure Active Directory and how they are created.

trans-unit.source: Dedicated groups in Azure Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Dedicated groups in Azure Active Directory

trans-unit.source: In Azure Active Directory, dedicated groups are created automatically and group membership for the dedicated groups is also automatic.
trans-unit.target: In Azure Active Directory, dedicated groups are created automatically and group membership for the dedicated groups is also automatic.

trans-unit.source: You cannot add or remove members to and from dedicated groups through the Azure portal, Windows PowerShell cmdlets, or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: You cannot add or remove members to and from dedicated groups through the Azure portal, Windows PowerShell cmdlets, or programmatically.

trans-unit.source: To enable dedicated groups, In the Azure portal, on the Configure tab, set the **Enable Dedicated Groups switch to Yes**.
trans-unit.target: To enable dedicated groups, In the Azure portal, on the Configure tab, set the **Enable Dedicated Groups switch to Yes**.

trans-unit.source: Once the Enable Dedicated Groups switch is set to **Yes**, you can further enable the directory to automatically create the All Users dedicated group by setting the **Enable “All Users” Group** switch to **Yes**.
trans-unit.target: Once the Enable Dedicated Groups switch is set to **Yes**, you can further enable the directory to automatically create the All Users dedicated group by setting the **Enable “All Users” Group** switch to **Yes**.

trans-unit.source: You can then also edit the name of this dedicated group by typing it in the **Display Name for “All Users” Group** field.
trans-unit.target: You can then also edit the name of this dedicated group by typing it in the **Display Name for “All Users” Group** field.

trans-unit.source: The All Users dedicated group can be useful if you want to assign the same permissions to all the users in your directory.
trans-unit.target: The All Users dedicated group can be useful if you want to assign the same permissions to all the users in your directory.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can grant all users in your directory access to a SaaS application by assigning access for the All Users dedicated group to this application.
trans-unit.target: For example, you can grant all users in your directory access to a SaaS application by assigning access for the All Users dedicated group to this application.

trans-unit.source: These articles provide additional information on Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: These articles provide additional information on Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Managing access to resources with Azure Active Directory groups
trans-unit.target: Managing access to resources with Azure Active Directory groups

trans-unit.target: Integrating your on-premises identities with Azure Active Directory
